 # Select a pizza to order
 
-$pizza = @{ Name = "some" }
+function Get-Pizza() {
+    return @{ Name = "some" }
+}
+
+$pizza = Get-Pizza;
 
 . ./src/order.ps1
 Submit-Order $pizza.Name
